text: (meya avadhānaya kaḷa pasuda), mūsāva ohugē vārgikayingen samaharekma viśvāsa kaḷaha. ovunda tamanva firavunda, ohugē pradhānīnda, vēdanā genadēvidō yayi biya veminma siṭiyaha. mandayat niyata vaśayenma firavun ema dēśayehi itāmat balasampannayeku vaśayen siṭi bævin sīmāva ikmavā (duk karadara æti) karamin siṭiyēya
